bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume XXX (Nos 2507-2530)

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.seg: Lobel E., The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Part XXX (Nos 2507-2530). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 44.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1964, 8°, [xii]-98 pp. et XIII pll.

C.R. par Alain Blanchard, REG 78 (1965) pp. 669-671. - William M. Calder III, CP 63 (1968) pp. 227-228. - Aristide Calderini, Aegyptus 44 (1964) p. 342. - Lloyd W. Daly, AJP 88 (1967) pp. 247-249. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 40 (1965) No. 80, pp. 443-447. - Augusto Traversa, Paideia 20 (1965) pp. 354-355. - Martin L. West, CR N.S., 16 (1966) pp. 21-24.
